data.author: RPB

changelog.release_notes:
- optimization of memory usage
- weekdays bug was fixed

Major update WMax:
- Weather error notifications
- New settings
- Weather update period
- Offline forecast for 1 day
- Season font

- New settings (GPS, location, openweathermap API key)
- Bug fixes

- Added "pressure unit" mmHg/hPa

NOTICE: Press the middle button to apply the settings for the watchface.

- Added support for the Pebble Diorite and SDK 4
- Increased battery lifetime

Add settings:
- Week starts on Sunday / Monday
Bug with UTC/GMT time on "Aplite" platform was fixed.
Performans improvements.

NOTICE: Press the middle button to apply the settings for a calendar or fonts.

What new:
-12/24 hour
Settings(pebble-clay): 
-Celsius / Fahrenheit 
-Alternative (system) font 
Bug fixes and performans improvements

WMax ver 1.62 beta 
Watchface with Maximum fuctionality WMax (wheather, date, calendar, battery state, BT ico when online + vibe on connect/disconnect)

data.description:
"WMax" 
Time, Weather, Calendar, Forecast, battery and bluetooth state + "Clay" settings:
1. Current time -12/24, custom fonts.
2. Weather  - current temperature °C/°F, temp min/max for next 24 hours, current pressure mmHg/hPa, location info, sunrise, sunset, weather icons, current temp and weather icons updates offline every 3h (from forecast data for next 24 hours)
3. Calendar for 3 weeks(current +/-1 week), weeks can start on Monday or Sunday
4. Pebble battery state (phone battery state still in development)
5. Blutooth state icon, vibe on connect/disconnect

latest_release.release_notes:
- optimization of memory usage
- weekdays bug was fixed

data.title: WMax
